1.verse: The elder to the beloved Gaius, whom I love in truth.

2.verse: May You Prosper In All Things, Just As Your Soul Is Prospering Because You Walk In The Truth - Beloved, I pray that with respect to all things you may prosper and be healthy, just as your soul is prospering.

3.verse: For I rejoiced greatly while brothers were coming and testifying concerning your truth— how you are walking in the truth.

4.verse: I have no joy greater than these things: that I may be hearing-of my children walking in the truth.

5.verse: Beloved, Support Fellow Workers For The Truth - Beloved, you are doing a faithful thing— whatever you may accomplish— for the brothers (and this, for strangers!)

6.verse: who testified concerning your love before the church, as to whom you will do well having sent-them-forward worthily of God.

7.verse: For they went out for the Name, taking nothing from the Gentiles.

8.verse: Therefore we ought to be supporting such ones, in order that we may be fellow-workers for the truth.

9.verse: Diotrephes Is Not Accepting Us. Beloved, Imitate The One Doing Good - I wrote something to the church, but Diotrephes, the one loving-to-be-first among them, is not accepting us.

10.verse: For this reason, if I come I will call-to-mind his deeds which he is doing— talking-nonsense-about us with malicious words. And not being content with these things, neither is he himself accepting the brothers. And he is forbidding and putting-out of the church the ones wanting to do so.

11.verse: Beloved, do not be imitating the evil, but the good. The one doing-good is from God. The one doing-evil has not seen God.

12.verse: Demetrius Is Attested By Everyone - With regard to Demetrius, he has been attested by everyone, and by the truth itself. And we also are testifying, and you know that our testimony is true.

13.verse: I had many things to write to you, but I do not wish to write to you with ink and pen.

14.verse: But I hope to see you at-once, and we will speak mouth to mouth. Peace to you. The friends greet you. Greet the friends by name.
